plot: This film frames the border of a small city in Catalonia, revealing how the current crisis shadows a much bigger and more permanent disaster across the seas.
title: El borde de la ciudad
plot_es: This film frames the border of a small city in Catalonia, revealing how the current crisis shadows a much bigger and more permanent disaster across the seas.
plot_en: This film frames the border of a small city in Catalonia, revealing how the current crisis shadows a much bigger and more permanent disaster across the seas.
